name: AbacusConnectionManager
description: AbacusConnectionManager. Manages a registry of local Inbox contracts for remote Outbox domains.

eventDecorators.name: InboxEnrolled
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new Inbox is enrolled / added.

parameterDecorators.name: domain
parameterDecorators.description: the remote domain of the Outbox contract for the Inbox.

eventDecorators.name: InboxUnenrolled
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new Inbox is un-enrolled / removed.

parameterDecorators.name: domain
parameterDecorators.description: the remote domain of the Outbox contract for the Inbox.

eventDecorators.name: OutboxSet
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new Outbox is set.

functionDecorators.name: enrollInbox
functionDecorators.description: Allow Owner to enroll Inbox contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _domain
parameterDecorators.description: the remote domain of the Outbox contract for the Inbox.

functionDecorators.name: getInboxes
functionDecorators.description: Returns the Inbox addresses for a given remote domain.

returnDecorators.description: inboxes An array of addresses of the Inboxes.

parameterDecorators.name: _inbox
parameterDecorators.description: the inbox to check for enrollment.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setOutbox
functionDecorators.description: Sets the address of the local Outbox contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _outbox
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new local Outbox contract.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: unenrollInbox
functionDecorators.description: Allow Owner to un-enroll Inbox contract.
